user_specs: ['Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Love this product. Formula goes on beautifully and lasts for ages. No need for a lip liner as it can be applied precisely and then filled in. My only issue is with sharpening. It does make a bit of a mess. Love that it comes with a sharpener and that it can all be stored together in the case. I need to check out other colours but I’m stuck on mystic right now.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Porcelain', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content: my all time favorite lippie! I wear all year around with any outfit. Truly “my lips but better”. Soooo creamy and beautiful!

I bought Sin because it was in a mini set and I loved it. The full size and the mini were two different colors and formulas. The Sin in the mini set was matte, and a slightly brighter color. The full size Sin was darker and had a sheen. I won't be purchasing again since I have no idea what I'll be getting. I did purchase Sephora Collection Flash Jumbo in Swift Nude and I love it better than either Sin nudestix. And at $4, it's a total winner.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: My favourite, HG, go-to, easypeasy blush! lasts all day, gives a healthy flush that sits in-between a cooler toned bronzer. It makes me feel pretty.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Porcelain', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content: Whisper is nothing like the color shown or described. It is much more orange/peachy. I would describe this as somewhere in the peach family rather than a cool-tones mocha, as described and shown. I wish the colors described and shown were more accurate/

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: The color sin is the best nude for my medium tan skin, it is just that kind of lipstick I am looking for, not too shiny, not too matte, but still feel moisturized. Normally, if you want to keep your lips moisturized, your lip color might disappear quickly, or you turn to a stay all day lipstick, you probably dry your lips severely. This one is a great balance, It helps me keep my lip healthy and beautiful.

user_specs: ['Age 25-34', 'Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Love love LOVE this lip pencil!!! It gives my lips the most beautiful nude color and it feels creamy and not dry

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content: I am disappointed ,about my product.From nude stix. The colour is not the same as the one I recieved from ipsy,at one time.I was excited to wear my forever colour. I just compared the shades in the end of the stick and they are different!IWhy ,would that be?I feel like I wasted 28$.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content:
Speaking as someone who generally hates wearing anything other than lip balm (or gloss if I’m feeling sassy) - this pencil is everything. Very comfortable, decently long lasting, reapplies easily... and the color is stunning. Also (and this doesn’t matter to anyone that isn’t allergic to gluten BUT) I cannot tell you how much appreciate that this brand is gluten free. A major reason I never wear lip products is due to my celiac. Love this brand!!!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_title: I bought this just to try it out and WOW!
review_content: I bought this just to try it out and WOW! This has become my go to color. I haven't tried it for the cheeks but for the lip I love it. I have bought multiple colors already. Love the feel and consistency of these. Mystic is my favorite color thus far.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content:
I was hesitant to try this line at first because it was so different but I am SO glad I did, the formula is so nice, for a matte lip product, and feels creamy on my lips. I also loveeee the fact that it doubles as a blush! On the cheeks it is very pigmented. I have used both my fingers and a brush too apply and it looks great either way. The shade Mystic is the perfect deep nude for my skin tone, usually when trying nude shade the colour pulls slightly orange but this one worked out perfectly.

Amazing color and application...I have to deduct some serious stars because the cap comes off easily and the pencil ruined the inside of my purse pocket.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Red', 'Skin Tone Porcelain', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: I have FINALLY found my perfect nude!! It feels like I have been on the hunt for years to find a lip product, that’s not a gloss, that is the perfect nude but THANK U nudestix I finally have it! Most “nude” lips are too dark and way too warm/peachy on me and trust me, I’ve tried A. LOT. So happy to find the perfect color in the perfect formula!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: I have tried many Nudestix pencils lately, and I have to say this one is definitely in my top three. The cream formula feels so smooth and buttery, like a balm. Mystic is a very flattering brownish mauve on my lips and I love it. The colour is subtle, but definitely there. It's the perfect everyday lip for me and I'll likely be stocking up.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content: Love this color and very easy to apply on the lips. However, I cannot apply this to the cheeks as it leaves harsh lines that do not blend out. I don't think this product is creamy enough for the cheeks.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Porcelain', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content: Love the colour and the formula. It is a bit darker than I was expecting but I am very fair.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Porcelain', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: “Whisper” is a beautiful color and great formula! I had tried “greystone” as my first nudestix product and didn’t have a good experience. The company saw my review and sent me complimentary shades in “whisper” and “rose” and I love them! I was not expecting that, and I really appreciate that gesture and the company’s attention to customers! :)

user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: great product! I used it to line my lips

user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Red', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: LOVE these pencils amazing color, long lasting...I always refill when I’m getting low

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Olive', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: I have a Nudestix obsession. I also have really bad allergies. Note that the cream lip pencil (and Blur pencil...) has Ricinus Communis Oil AKA CASTOR OIL. If you have allergies you should really watch out and stay away.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
I am in love with the NUDESTIX line. Truly the best lip colors and great staying power. I love having the sharpener included. I do agree with other fans that I do hope they sell the lip and cheek pencils without the cool tin. Once you have it, you really do not need anymore. I have at least six of the lip pencils and I have created fans out of my friends as well. I have olive tone skin and love the color SIN. I also love that the line is organic, vegan and cruelty free. Another great product of theirs is the concealer pencil. It is perfect for covering up my red undertone colored and oily eyelids. The concealer doesn't crease or budge at all.
…read more

I bought the color Mystic when it first came out and loved the texture and the color was a perfect mauve pinky-nude. I recently bought another one and it was completely different-- wrong texture, color was too pink and no shine! The only difference I noticed on the packaging was the manufacturer. The one I love was made in Germany and the newer one is made in Czech Republic. Disappointed. In the picture, the one on the bottom was I was expecting: high shine, super creamy. Top: different color, not as creamy or shiny.
…read more

This is the most beautiful color I have ever found --RIPE for my skin tone, green eyes and red hair! However, that said, it does NOT last long at all. It is a very, very soft stick and needs sharpening often because it doesn't go far. If I use it on my lips AND cheeks, it's gone pretty fast.

Really like the concept of these on-the-go pencils. Very portable and travel friendly. I got the color Whisper. Have only used it on my lips, as this shade is fairly close to my own skin tone. On my 2Y04 skin tone, this shade looks very similar to a Kat Von D lipstick that was discontinued due to its name. It also has a similar texture. Matte lip, but I wouldn't say it is creamy. Not overly drying either. However, since I do have dry lips already, I like to add a drop of Fresh Lip Serum or Aerin Lip Conditioner on top.
…read more

I have this in Ripe, and I love the color. It reminds me of a lip pencil BeneFit used to have, but discontinued years ago, Ripe is a pinky-peach color with a slight sheen. It looks beautiful on my lips and on my cheeks. My only problem with it i it's a bit soft for Arizona makeup during hot weather. If I carry it around with me in hot weather, it melts. I keep it in my bathroom, and it's fine to use in the morning. As a blush it lasts all day. However,I'm one of those people who needs to reapply lipstick, but I can't carry this one around in the summertime. It's not moisturizing on my lips, either. It doesn't really dry them, but I like some moisture in my lipsticks.
…read more
The intense matte is nice and so is the regular creamy formula. Not too pigmented, not long lasting either but nice as a lip liner or a pop of color.
Love it. So creamy and perfect. Dries to a matte but doesn't dry. The color is rich. Perfect.
This lip pencil is ridiculously creamy. I love the formula so much. There's a little bit of transfer but thats not surprising as its a cream-based lip pencil. I can't wait to try other colours
I have been hunting for a light nude lipstick forever and I found it!! I got Flesh and it's lovely. Doesn't feather, gives this nice beautiful subtle color! I'm hooked!

Not a fan of this. I've been searching for a nice flesh toned nude and so I got the color Flesh.. it was still way too pink and just looked goofy in my opinion, like an overly shimmery drug store gloss crayon but with poor coverage. I think mainly I just didn't like the color with my skin tone though. I returned it.
Pleasantly surprised! Really comfy to wear and the color whisper is the perfect nude for every look.

It has taken me way too long to review these pencils. I am a total Nudestix addict. Started with Mystic and was stunned by the quality- better than anything I have ever owned (and I've owned A LOT). Easily the longest wearing, most comfortable lip I've got. Since then, I've bought a bunch more - across the whole line - and recommend this brand to anyone. Seriously the best.
This is a really nice matte formula that is a little drying but it never bleeds and the shade "whisper" is so flattering for pale skin with the best possible tinge of brown!

Amazing products . I am literally going to toss all of my other liquid lipsticks in the trash . I was so tired of them drying . This lip stays on and didnt dry my lips out . This product is quality !!!

Colour and texture were okay. While I found that it was creamy, it was not necessarily moisturizing, and it seemed a bit too thick/sticky to use on cheeks. While I find it a bit overpriced to purchase again for myself, it would make a nice gift because of cute packaging.

I have never been able to achieve smooth application with matte lipsticks because my lips are too dry. I love this lip pencil because it has great pigment and moisturizing. Very natural-looking colors!
Perfect natural color! It's super creamy and hydrating!

I got Sin and it is a bright pink but very wearable. I like this product as a lip pencil, it feels nice and looks great. But I LOVE it as a blush. I am not a fan of cream blush or blush sticks, I mostly use powder blush, but this is so blendable and easy to use and it stays really well. All the lip/cheek pencils I have from NUDESTIX look amazing as blushes.

review_title: great product, lasting power, not packaging
review_content:
I love nudestix overall, all the pencils i have bought and used never disappoints, I love how natural it is and moisturizing, however, it is the not the kind of lipstick that last for a long time, it is more of like a butter lipstick, so if you dont like reapplying the product then this is not for you.. the packaging is the worst, i know it is their statement and they stay away from plastics and all but sharpening the pencil waste so much product.. all in all great product, but hopefully they change their packaging.
…read more

I purchased this lip pencil as I was looking for an everyday shade that's not too much in your face. The Sin one is just perfect colour wise but it makes my lips really dry. I like the packaging and the fact that it includes a sharpener though.
Works great, nice color, easy to take with you.

review_title: Good for cheeks and travel, not so much for lips
review_content: The pencil color was too light for lips (I have a lot of color in my lips so it washed them out), and the texture was a bit dry for that area. However, it worked great for cheeks, and the mirrored case was great for travel, could even put other pencils inside.
Love how it spreads on naturally and looks sunkissed. Awesome pigment. The sharpener cap didn't stay well for me and the stick rubbed off all inside my purse. The regular cap works fine though.

I have the colour "sin" which is absolutely beautiful. I wear it all the time and its enough colour to add a little something to my look without making it look "too much" - making it perfect for everyday. I would LOVE to repurchase this because the product makes my lips feel nice and the colour is so pretty but I just can't get over the packaging, It would make so much more sense to have a wind-up lip tube vs. one you have to sharpen. I feel like I'm wasting product and it is honestly a hassle. I think it's in nudestix best interest to change the packaging
…read more

Easy to apply, long lasting and does not make your lips dry. Mystic is the perfect nude for me. I originally received this in a monthly beauty subscription and I immediately went out and bought a second one. Highly recommend.

I like this a lot. I am looking for every day, paraben free, make up items to replace my go to faourites, and this is the first nude I liked enough to throw away my Laura Mercier. It goes on nicely, I like the colour both on my cheeks and lips, and it lasts as long as anything else I have worn. The pencil also doesn't seem to break easily, while still being easy to apply. I love the convenience, and I will try other colours for sure.

There's so much product on this pencil, which I love for the price. However, this lipstick wasn't the smoothest and I got the shade Whisper, which also was too light for me. I prefer to use it as a cheek pencil and maybe I'll love it more if the next purchase wasn't so white based.
Whisper is one of my go-to nudes- I love the way it applies, it looks amazing with my fair skin. Goes with every eye look! The only thing I don't love is the taste- very strange
Went on very dry. I returned it.
I love EVERYTHING about Nudestix!!! I have multiple sticks in multiple colors! They are creamy, beautiful and they stay!!!!

The color is great on my skin, it stays on for quite some time and it does not dry up. It's one of my favorite nude pencils. I have 2 now. I would not use it in the cheeks, but for the lips its great.

I received the shade Whisper in my "Give Me Some Nude Lip" set and I was so excited when I searched this! The color looked like a gorgeous mauve-nude. However, when I put it on my lips it looked like I had applied concealer all over my mouth. It swatches differently on the skin so be warned! Despite that, the texture felt amazing so I decided to give the cheek aspect a try and I am crazy about it! It's the perfect everyday blush color when I don't want anything pink or shimmery! Overall recommend for the lips and checks as long as you get the right color.
…read more
Ugh this stuff was drying, and did me no good. I was hoping for some plumpness,some moisture..naw. "Sin" was a literal SIN to buy. I wanted to love it tho :(((((

I chose the colour "Ripe - coral/peach" and am very pleased with the results. It looks great to have a matching lip and cheek colour and this is worth having, simply for the fact that it's two products in one. The alternate lid with the sharpener attached is handy. The case with mirror is a nice place to store the sharpener at home while carrying the lip/cheek stick with regular lid in my purse. I recommend applying to the lips first to warm up the temperature of the product before placing on cheeks. Although it has a natural look, it adds just enough colour to be pretty. This is suitable for all occasions and if I had to pick only one make-up product for the rest of my life, this would be it.

have the color "whisper" kind of washes me out but i paired it with a brown nude lip liner from urban decay n it looks great! havent used it on my cheeks tho, ill reserve it as a lip product only lol

Love the natural colour, the texture for both lips and cheeks (not to greasy to use on cheeks, not too drying to use on lips), the ease of application. A one-stop shop for both cheeks and lips makes for an excellent travel companion. Will purchase other colours and try other formulas of the same brand!
Great colour, smooth application, smells great!
Love, love! Will be purchasing more colors in the future. I haven't tested on cheeks but love the creamy formula on the lips!
I absolutely love these! I want them all!
goes on very easy.. i have the shade whisper and got many compliments!!
The Perfect shade !!! Mystic , got sample in my Ipsy and had to buy a full size for my makeup bag .

No matter how the color product performs, the smell from the wooden pencil package is not cute. Feels like some house construction going on when applying. Would rather have it in a traditional lipstick form. What is the benefit by using "pencil" form for a non slim product???

I tend to avoid products that need to be sharpened, but I was pleasantly surprised by this one! The texture is creamy and applies beautifully. Mine is in the shade Whisper, which is a nice nude but somewhat washes me out. I seem to be the only person that's confused about this being used on your cheeks... not something I would do. I wouldn't say I noticed incredible staying power, but overall I am happy with this product.

I received this product in my Ipsy monthly bag and it is so amazing. I have caramel brown skin with warm undertones brown eyes and brown hair! This color goes perfect with my skin and it is has a nice smooth creamy texture. Great for everyday wear. All season color! The only thing is that it is a crayon so you will have to sharpen this product. Can create a mess if you ask me. But all around good product.
I got this in my nude lipstick set in the shade Whisper. It's a really nice color, good for every-day casual look, easy to apply and matte. The shape makes it so you don't really need lipliner.
This lip pencil in Mystic is INCREDIBLE I ONLY wear gloss but when I got this as a gift I really loved how it looked!

I have this in the color Mystic and the color is absolutely beautiful. Took away a star only because I think pencils tend to be very wasteful of product and the staying time is not quite as long as I wish it was. It does not seem drying at all (and I have really dry lips) but seriously....this color is PERFECT.

I am olive skinned and have dark lips that tend to bleed through everything. I also look bad in most lip colors so I stick to sheer glosses but Nudstix in Mystic has become my new favorite lip color/liner. Super creamy, effortless application, looks completely natural and lasts for hours. Truly compliments my natural lip color while adding an extra little pop. If you want to look made up in a natural way - I highly recommend trying this product!

The amazing colour stayed for hours! I love the texture and the fact that it does not taste anything. I am blonde and I thought that the colour whisper was very flattering. So happy to have a new favourite cruelty free brand!

I got this in the shade Whisper in the Sephora Give Me Some Nude Lip Kit I like it a lot just my only problem with it is when I use it on my lips even if I exfoliate first it dries up and you see all the lines on my lips (I'm only 17) so what I like to do is apply the Sephora kiss me balm in creme brûlée first and then apply it ... It gives my lips a shine and doesn't let the product dry up .. It appears more as a gloss ... Great product just gave it 4 stars cuz it's so drying

I received this product in a monthly makeup subscription service. It has a nice texture that feels moisturizing and looks like a lipstick on my lips. The color 'Mystic' is a nice neutral that I can wear everyday. For the expensive price tag though, I would rather go with the Nars Velvet Gloss Lip Pencil.

review_title: love the color but the formula....
review_content: I got my nudestix in flesh and I absolutely love the color but the formula is VERY drying and my lips flake throughout the day even when I use a lip primer/moisturizer. Wish the formula was more hydrating.

I had seen someone wearing the color 'love' and it looked like the perfect pink for nude lips. Unfortunately when I tried it on, it wasn't moisturizing or creamy. The color was much too pale pink and washed me out. It's a matte color as well which I wasn't aware of and the stick didn't make this easy to apply, it also bled everywhere.

I was a little hesitant to try this line of products because I'm not the biggest fan of pencils (so much sharpening, such a waste in my opinion) but oh my goodness, I am THRILLED I've discovered this! I got the Whisper shade of this pencil and I never knew there was such a perfect nude shade for my lips... Literally, every nude lipstick/gloss/anything I've ever tried has made me look sick and washed out. I have pale yellow-toned skin and once upon a time I found a shade I loved from Buxom but it was discontinued, so sadly, I gave up on ever wearing a nude lip again. What a miracle that I found this. Whisper is absolute perfection. As if the color alone wasn't enough, the formula is wonderful too. It keeps my lips moisturized and doesn't settle into lines or bleed. Not to mention, I've been using it for weeks and still haven't had to sharpen it! A little goes a long way... I will definitely be buying more of these. Consider me converted :)

I personally don't really recommend this product in the shade "whisper" simply because it didn't really go on very well over my lips. I see that the formula settles into the tiny lines on my lips, even after exfoliation. There's also a scent to it, similar to that of cheap crayons or colored pencils, and I find that the packaging is great since it comes with a built in sharpener, but I think that's why it smells like colored pencils.

I am really in love with this color, it's perfect for my light skin tone; a my lips but better color. I wasn't really fond of the other colors in this line since I'm not into nude and very light shades so if you have pigmented lips like I do and want to make them a touch darker this is definitely the shade for you.

I got this in the new Gimme Some Lip Sephora Favourites set. Beautiful nudie nude colour. I wrote a little review on it on my blog. Including the rest in the Favourites set. Check it out on eternally-graceful dot blogspot dot com.

Got the full size of this from the Sephora Give Me Some Nude lip set. It is fantastic. Really easy to blend. Color is very natural, like Tarte Exposed (on my skin, at least). If you set it with powder, it will last for a long time. Closest drugstore dupe is the Flower Beauty cream blush in Rose O Dendron.

Hey Sephora, thank you for FINALLY fixing the description but you still got it wrong. The nudestix is not full size as per your own website. The description of an individually purchased nudestix lip cheek pencil says it is 0.05 oz while the one in this kit is listed as being 0.088 oz. Please get it together. Customers rely heavily on descriptions and this one isn't working out.
I picked up the shade Blush at Sephora today and I love it. It is a perfect nude color for my lips. Its really creamy and glides on smoothly.

review_title: Very nice colors and long lasting
review_content: They were really nice colors and lasted a long time. Easy to apply on both lips and cheek

I was excited to try this, but it didn't live up to my expectations. This pencil is almost too creamy for lips, and since it settled into my lip lines it wasn't very attractive. Also as people have mentioned before, it smells/tastes like a crayon. It worked great as a cheek color, it blended well and looked natural, but it was a tad too sparkly for my preference. Since it only served one function for me I definitely wouldn't pay this price for it.
…read more

I got a tin with three minis and am currently wearing Mystic. I love the natural shade! It applies easily and is wonderfully moisturizing. I have been sitting in my room doing nothing for just an hour or two, though, and already it seems to have faded and spread... Perhaps a primer or lipliner would bring this product to its full potential. It's just too creamy on its own. It does blend easily, though-- I combined it with a matte Sephora lipstick for a perfect blend! It stuck better, too. Packaging is just too much. A tin for every purchase? How wasteful! This company would do better to offer a recycling program at least.

I bought this bought with high hopes but I'm not very impressed. The colour "love" is really nice and looks good but it smells and tastes terrible. When I put it on, the first comment I got from my boyfriend was you smell like crayon :P I wouldn't buy it again because it was too expensive. You're basically paying for the packaging. I don't even use the tin to be honest.You can find something better for the same price or lower. A lot of product is wasted when you sharpen it too.
…read more

review_title: nice but not for the money
review_content:
I bought this product for a trip. I like the color Lust. It's very natural, goes on nicely. The tin is nice with the sharpener but not necessary if I want to keep purchasing this in different shades. When sharpening you loose a lot of product. So what I do is sharpen over a tissue pull off the shavings and use the product to put on my cheeks. I feel you should have an option when purchasing more to just buy the pencil alone and a lesser price. I do not need tin after tin and all the sharpeners. Even better, if this product was a twist up, less product would be wasted and worth it's price! Not sure if I'll purchase more...
…read more
They are soft & creamy but exactly what they say ... Nude Sticks ... Pretty .. I like them but I feel they are too pricey for what they are

This pencil is super easy to use on the lips and cheeks. For the lips, it goes on really smooth and is a nice nudish-pink colour. For the cheeks, blending it in with your fingertips is really easy and it also gives you a dewy-pink natural glow look. I really like this product.
Great colors, really natural. Super smooth on the lips. I would consider buying more from the line; they are overpriced in my opinion

I like the color and application of the color I bought, but I'm not sure if I would rebuy simply due to the price. The price of this product is clearly due to the lavish packaging. I personally think it is absolutely unnecessary for each product to come with a tin and sharpener. It jacks up the price and is very wasteful. I would collect ever lip/cheek color but I absolutely do NOT need 7 tins. I think this company needs to think about how much waste they are producing/making customers pay for.
…read more

This was an impulse buy and I was so pleasantly surprised by how creamy and easy to apply these are. Unlike many other lipstick crayons, these are prefect for both lining your lip and filling it in. If you are not gifted in the art of makeup application (like me), then this is for you! I bought the color Mystic which is beautiful, and then subsequently bought Sin and Blush which are also nice.

I purchased the colors Ripe and Sin and loved the colors but I have two issues with this product, you have to continue to sharpen them which in turn you lose product and they each come in a tin which is a waste after buying two of them....they should stop offering the tin and put the money into remarketing this product as a twist up product so you would not lose so much product. Not worth the hefty price of $24. Would not purchase these again.
…read more

I love the pencil idea for lipsticks and I actually really like the idea of the tin - keeps everything together and no shavings escape into my makeup kit. HOWEVER, I have been searching for a really pretty pink lip colour that isn't too "old lady" looking on me, This isn't it, I am afraid. It's probably very nice on young, smooth lips, but when I wear it on my lips, I look like I'm trying too hard to find my youth again. I will mix the colour with a nude lip colour to tone it down. As a blush, it's quite pretty, but doesn't last very well (I find this to be the case with most cream blushes). The formula is lovely - soft and creamy. May try another colour.
…read more
Ordered the lip and cheek pencil in sin and it's absolutely gorgeous! Great colour for summer/autumn as it's a slightly darker pink - works great on cheeks as well

Goes on and blends easily. It's great for travel since one pencil takes care of cheeks and lips and no need for brushes.The color is very subtle--they're not kidding when they say that these pencils are for that no-makeup makeup look. I got Blush and am considering trying one of the darker colors. The tin that this comes in is nice, but I feel like it's kind of unnecessary, especially if I end up buying more of these; I don't need the tin every time. What am I supposed to do with the leftover tins? I like that this comes with its own sharpener though.

I've tried 5 of these: Mystic, Soul, Whisper, Love, and Flesh. Love and Flesh are very sheer and feel like a totally different formula than the other pencils which are thick and opaque. Soul and Mystic are both a weird orangey color and just looked ugly and unflattering on. Flesh is a super pale nude that's also really unflattering. I love this pencil. My skin is very sensitive, oily, and just about everything makes me breakout but not this. Great cheek color that I found to be long lasting. I love how easy it is to use and toss in my bag. Great lip color too. Best lip and cheek combo I've tired yet.

Picked this up to try out (and to have a compact mirror). The color Mystic is great for people of darker complexions like me! I was surprised! Its a dusty pink color, now i want to try their coral color, which i tried out in-store and liked too.

I am absolutely IN LOVE with this product. It is so long lasting and so natural looking. The texture is amazing. It is so creamy and so easy to apply. I put foundation on my lips to cancel out any colour and then I use my fingers to apply the lip and cheek pencil. It makes my lips look naturally flushed. I have mystic and I keep it in my makeup bag at all times. It doesn't sit heavily on the lips like a lot of lipsticks do and doesn't accentuate the wrinkles on my lips at all. In fact, it makes my lips look smoother. **Just a tip, the colours are quite different in person than they are on the website. If you can get to a sephora where these pencils are sold, I would recommend that rather than choosing the colours online. If the entire collection is not sold at your store, there are usually dual ended pencils in the travel section where they have two shades in one pencil. That way, you can swatch some of them before purchasing online.
